Uses of Class
com.asemantics.rdfcoder.repository.RepositoryException

  • Packages that use RepositoryException 
    Package Description
    com.asemantics.rdfcoder.repository
    This package defines utility classes to handle a file system repository able to store and organize the library data.

    • Uses of RepositoryException in com.asemantics.rdfcoder.repository

      Checks the repository folder.

      Creates a new resource into the repository.

      Opens an input stream on the resource.

      Returns a repository at a given location.

      Returns an existing resource.
